Headline: Temporary Westbound #103 West 103rd  Reroute near 103rd/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted near 103rd/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Pulaski, 100th layover Brother Rice High School, Pulaski, 103rd, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 103rd/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
